casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginald Underwood FULLARD 309P15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2017 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, Reginald Fullard, for Fullard, Reginald Underwood Karen A. Blum, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of June 2017 by Defendant for Appeal for Order Entry:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of June 2017."
